patch:
Index: 01hdbcfvynjc8vhtmqhsfr5pzs
===================================================================
--- 01hdbcfvynjc8vhtmqhsfr5pzs
+++ 01hdbcfvynjc8vhtmqhsfr5pzs
@@ -125,12 +125,13 @@
 　　IMPORTED_LINK_INTERFACE_LIBRARIES baz) # <-- dependency is here
 
 ## 动态库
 
-    Windows平台下, 需要在顶级CMakeLists.txt文件中设置: CMAKE_WINDOWS_EXPORT_ALL_SYMBOLS 为 1
-    if(MSVC)
-      set(CMAKE_WINDOWS_EXPORT_ALL_SYMBOLS 1)
-    endif()
+  #### Windows平台下, 需要在顶级CMakeLists.txt文件中设置: CMAKE_WINDOWS_EXPORT_ALL_SYMBOLS 为 1来到出dll符号.
+            if(MSVC)
+              set(CMAKE_WINDOWS_EXPORT_ALL_SYMBOLS 1)
+            endif()
+  ####  否则会链接不成功.
 
 　　add_library(bar SHARED IMPORTED)
 
 　　set_property(TARGET bar PROPERTY IMPORTED_LOCATION c:/path/to/bar.dll)
